name: Wish Simulator: Genshin Impact
description:
The most optimized and realistic genshin wish simulator.

In this Genshin Impact Wish Sim you can get all the coveted characters from Genshin Impact, the chances are realistic and everything is just like in Genshin Impact! You can also browse and build your collection of characters, and enjoy your collection, as the game has a Character Gallery and a Weapon Gallery! Try this Genshin Wish!

Have a good game!. I hope this Wish Impact u like!





All references to "Genshin Impact" in the title, short description, and description are for the purpose of identifying the app to potential users, and are not intended to infringe trademarks.
